blocks.headline: TinaCMS vs Sanity: Elevate Your Experience with TinaCMS
blocks.text: See why TinaCMS is the preferred choice for developers and content creators alike.

blocks.content:
## Why Choose TinaCMS Over Sanity?

TinaCMS provides a seamless local development workflow, markdown support, and visual editing capabilities that set it apart from Sanity. Here's why TinaCMS might be the right fit for your project:

items.headline: Markdown Support
items.text: TinaCMS's markdown support is a game changer for developers and writers. The simplicity of markdown coupled with the flexibility of TinaCMS makes content creation and management a breeze.

items.headline: Visual Editing Capabilities
items.text: TinaCMS provides a live editing experience that is unmatched. This allows for real-time feedback, making content creation intuitive and interactive.

items.headline: Seamless Local-Development Workflow
items.text: With TinaCMS, you can change your schema and content, and merge them in one commit. This powerful feature facilitates a seamless local development workflow.

items.headline: Git-Based Content Management
items.text: TinaCMS's Git-based content management provides built-in version control for your site. This makes it perfect for open-source or closed-source projects.

items.headline: No Vendor Lock-In
items.text: Avoid the pitfalls of vendor lock-in. With TinaCMS, your content is stored in a Git repository. Own your content!

items.headline: Customizable and Flexible
items.text: TinaCMS is built to be customizable, empowering you to create the exact experience you want for your website.

blocks.headline: Ready to switch to TinaCMS?
blocks.text: Get started with TinaCMS now, and see the difference it makes.
